name: Pumpkin's Casino
description:
YOUR A PAIR OF DICE AND YOU NEED TO ESCAPE!

Your soul can only handle one die at a time, Luckly you can swap between both die! 

You can also jump!

Get to the golden flag pole to escape!

*Gamepad supported (tested xbox controller)

Made for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022 (July). The Game theme is "Roll of the dice". Check out Game Maker's Toolkit on Youtube!

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Space - jump

Q- Swap to dice 1

E - Swap to dice 2

Mouse look around

Escape - Exit game

R - reset level

Gamepad:

Right stick - Movement

A - jump

Left bumper- Swap to dice 1

Right bumper - Swap to dice 2

Right stick -  look around

Y - reset level

Software Used:

Game Engine - Unreal Engine 4.27

3D Modeling - Maya

Materials and texturing - Substance Designer, Substance Painter

Additional graphics - Photoshop

Credits:

All Programming - PumpkinKingGames

All Art - PumpkinKingGames

Music - Music Generations 30's - Evil Mind (Unreal Engine marketplace)

***PLEASE RATE MY GAME!***
